review: My Samsung is about 2 years old and is a SmartTV however the apps are outdated and the entire process is slow getting these apps fired up.  The Amazon Fire TV Stick works better than I had previously hoped it would.  I like how everything is integrated into one Menu System.  Its easy to switch between Prime, Hulu, Netflix and other applications.  I am about 1 month into Cutting the Cord and this has made it much easier to be able to gather all of these applications into one Menu.  Also the fact that I can quickly surf my Amazon Prime queue and Movies I have purchased makes this even better.  The Fire Stick does not come with Voice Control via the included remote, but you can download a Controller App and the Voice Control works extremely well if you want that feature but do not want to purchase the FireTV.  I am planning on getting a FireTV for the other TV in the house.
